pages.text: Skelts are special skeletons summoned using a $(l:archon:necromancy/undead_staff)Staff of Undead$(). There are three type of skelts, each being summoned from a different $(l:archon:necromancy/souls)soul core$() type. A skelt will follow you around and attack with you. You can stop them from following you by sneaking and right-clicking them with a Staff of Undead.
Normal Skelts do not have any special properties and walk slowly.
Prime Skelts are faster skelts with iron swords. You can give them armor by shift right-clicking them.
Omega Skelts are massive skelts with lots of HP. They are slow but tanky, with stronger attacks.
